articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asian markets inch higher ahead of key China data, Japan service inflation heats up - CNBC
articles.description: Investors brace for a slew of economic data this week, including China's November factory activity numbers and inflation readings from Japan and Australia.
articles.content:
Tiananmen, Gate of Heavenly Peace, Beijing
Asia-Pacific stocks fell on Monday as the Chinese market dropped due to a decline in property firms, while Japan's service inflation surged to a 45-month h… [+1755 chars]
